definition: to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: Each of the children, past life was not hurt is broken winged Orleans roast chicken wings.
sentences.chinese: 每个伤不起的孩子，上辈子都是折翼的奥尔良烤鸡翅。

sentences.english: This kind of thing, if you are accustomed to real writing, hurts your insides.
sentences.chinese: 如果你已经习惯了真正的写作，这些东西，你伤不起。

definition: (lit.) so exhausted (by difficulties in a relationship) that one feels one could never fall in love again (Internet slang)/disenchanted with sth
euphemistic equivalent of 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
(coll.) to feel sick at heart/to feel stifled/to feel crushed
to stop one's pen/to break off writing/final remarks (at the end of a book or article)
Nyima county, Tibetan: Nyi ma rdzong in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet
cup/(slang) (pun on 悲劇|悲剧[bei1 ju4], tragedy) so bad/terrible/bummer/fiasco/debacle
aw, fuck! (loanword from Korean 아! 씨발!)
(Internet slang) I can't even.../Are you kidding me!/OMG!
